ruleset.name: Apex Code Style Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code style and formatting

rule.name: MapInitializationMustBeMultiLine
rule.message: Map initialization with {0} or more entries must be formatted with each entry on its own line for better readability
rule.description:
Map initializations with a minimum number of entries must be formatted with each entry on its own line to improve readability and maintainability. Maps with fewer entries may remain on a single line.
To customize this rule, edit the $minEntries variable at the beginning of the XPath expression (default: 2). This sets the minimum number of map entries required before multi-line formatting is required.
